This article explains the limits of the CRA and build tools regarding routing, waterfalls, code splitting, and more. However, you can still build a React app from scratch using Vite, Parcel, Rsbuild, or other modern build tools.The initial announcement sparked heated debates on X and GitHub, mainly because it overemphasized frameworks at the expense of build tools like Vite.
